definitions.definition: To be an example of; to have all the attributes of.
examples: Mozart could be said to personify musical genius.

definitions.definition: To create a representation of (an abstract quality) in the form of a character or persona .
examples: The writer personified death in the form of the Grim Reaper.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To be an example of; to have all the attributes of.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To create a representation of (an abstract quality) in the form of a character or persona .
